remarks: Casting out powers of the identity element leaves the group power unchanged.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxmodid.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxmodid.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
gxmodid.3 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxmodid $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ M e. NN ) /\ ( A e. X /\ ( A P M ) = U ) ) -> ( A P ( K mod M ) ) = ( A P K ) ) $.
